titles.title: Retirement Security Preservation Act of 2014
A bill to amend the nondiscrimination provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to protect older, longer, service participants.
Retirement Security Preservation Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Retirement Security Preservation Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to nondiscrimination requirements for tax-exempt employee pension, profit-sharing, and stock bonus plans, to include protections for older, longer service participants in such plans, including the grandfathering of such participants under defined benefit plans.
